titles.title: Equitable Mineral Lease Revenue Sharing Restoration Act
To restore equitable sharing with affected States of revenues from onshore Federal mineral leases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: 2/6/2008--Introduced. Equitable Mineral Lease Revenue Sharing Restoration Act - Amends the Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008, to repeal the requirement that the Secretary of the Interior deduct 2% from the amount payable to each state in FY2008, and deposit such amount to miscellaneous receipts of the Treasury.
